@htctouch: You haven't look hard enough. I found dozen of subs for Uni.Sold.Regen.
on podnapisi dot net by doing plain Search.

You must rename
Universal.Soldier.Regeneration.2009.DVDSCR-CM8.srt
in
Universal.Soldier.Regeneration.DVDSCR.H264[PC.Mac.Xbox.PS3.ipod].srt

and sub is automatically loaded by VLC player, MediaPlayer Classic and mplayer. I tried and subtitle is good even if that one has been made for CM8 screener.
Same "rule?for changing the name of the sub should be always applied.
